publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-720.1.1 Tommy Sheridan: Holyrood Project—As an amendment to amendment to motion (S1M-720.1) in the name of Donald Gorrie, insert after "nearby buildings" "and (iii) the conversion of the India Street complex in Glasgow utilising the 150,000 square feet of office accommodation available and the old Glasgow High School debating chamber."
